snippet.title: Turovero: The Celestial Tower! [BLIND] Part 1: The Heroes Of Justice
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty]

From the creator of Prom Dreams comes a more traditional RPG (which promises plenty of horror!), where four best friends journey into the celestial tower known as Turovero on a quest to rid the world of the Dark One, the source of the world's evils! 

In this first part, we explore the ground floor (the tutorial level essentially), and get used to the mechanics, the battles, and meet our colorful cast of characters! [The writing in this game has been superb so far!]

Game made by QZ Productions!
You can read more about the game and download it here! https://turoveroofficial.tumblr.com/about
QZ Productions on Twitter! https://twitter.com/QZProductions
